scripts.optimise-css: cleancss -o css/combined.min.css css/bootstrap.css css/style.css && node scripts/optimise-css.js
scripts.optimise-js: uglifyjs js/jquery.min.js js/bootstrap.min.js js/plugins.min.js js/jquery.flexslider-min.js js/touchTouch.jquery.js -o js/all.min.js && node scripts/optimise-js.js
scripts.optimise: npm run optimise-css && npm run optimise-js
scripts.optimise-all: npm run optimise-css && npm run optimise-js && npm run optimise-images
